alert.note: Alert for Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 10:14PM EST until January 04 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Stillwater Creek At Uhrichsville affecting Tuscarawas County.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. OHC157-040700- /O.EXT.KPBZ.FL.W.0002.000000T0000Z-220104T0700Z/ /URVO1.N.ER.220102T2207Z.220103T1530Z.220104T0320Z.NO/ 1014 PM EST Mon Jan 3 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Stillwater Creek At Uhrichsville. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Stillwater Creek comes out of its banks in several locations resulting in overflowing in poor drainage areas. Minor flooding of low lying areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM EST Monday was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 7.4 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
